name: I crossed over into the world of magic
name_original: I crossed over into the world of magic
description:
A modern girl is suddenly transported to the world of magic. At the same time she possessed the ancient magic. Use this magic to repel the dangerous uncle. Come and save her.

Once in the Start page, click the first button to cross the girl into the magic world. Use WSAD on your keyboard to control the girl's movement. Mouse movement rotates the view. Right mouse button to switch perspective. All magic attacks are automatic. Don't let the uncle touch the girl. The game is in unlimited mode and has no ending. There will be more and more uncles.

The current version contains two narrative scenarios and one endless scenario. The plot will vary with the progress of killing Uncle. Finally, there will be a big BOSS, defeat the big BOSS to complete the current plot. Endless scene can be unlimited game time, scene will appear a lot of uncle want you to attack, you will get energy after killing the uncle, every time the energy is full will improve the character attributes, later will be more and more uncle, you will become stronger and stronger. Play time is completely controlled.
